alert.note: Alert for Macon (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 30 at 5:18PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Macon County through 545 PM EDT... At 518 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was near Montezuma, or near Oglethorpe, moving northwest at 20 mph. HAZARD...40 mph wind and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Oglethorpe, Montezuma, Ideal, Whitewater State Park, Garden Valley, Winchester, Bartlett and Hicks. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
